title: Scenario ONE Kali Linux
description: This is a custom Kali Linux scenario using Ubuntu as the base image.

steps.title: Step 1 - Update and Install Kali Tools
steps.text: Run the following commands to set up Kali tools on Ubuntu.
steps.code: apt update && apt install -y curl wget gnupg2

steps.title: Step 2 - Add Kali Repository
steps.text: Add the Kali Linux repository to the sources list and import the GPG key.
steps.code: echo 'deb http://http.kali.org/kali kali-rolling main non-free contrib' | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/kali.list && wget -q -O - https://archive.kali.org/archive-key.asc | apt-key add -

steps.title: Step 3 - Install Kali Tools
steps.text: Update the package list and install Kali tools.
